entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 13. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 60 percent chance of flurries this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 27 this morning and minus 16 this afternoon. Forecast issued 06:34 AM MST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 18. POP 60%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening with 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind becoming east 30 km/h this evening. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 06:34 AM MST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 13. POP 30%
